title: GrimoireCSSConfigJSON
description: Schema for the GrimoireCSS configuration file

variables.description: Optional framework-level variables used during compilation

^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$.description: A key-value pair for variables, where the key is the variable name and the value is the variable's value.

scrolls.description: Optional scrolls configuration containing external or combined CSS rules

projects.description: A list of projects within the configuration. Each project corresponds to specific input/output settings.

shared.description: Optional shared configuration settings used across multiple projects

critical.description: Optional critical styles configuration for inlining into HTML files

ScrollJSON.description: A scroll is a reusable collection of CSS rules

spells.description: A list of CSS spells within the scroll

extends.description: Optional list of other scrolls this one extends

ProjectJSON.description: Represents a project configuration within GrimoireCSS. Supports glob patterns in input paths.

projectName.description: The name of the project, following the pattern `^[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+$`.

inputPaths.description: List of input paths for the project. Supports glob patterns.

items.description: A file path or glob pattern used to locate project files.

outputDirPath.description: Optional output directory path for the project's CSS

singleOutputFileName.description: Optional file name for a single output file

GrimoireConfigSharedJSON.description: Represents shared configuration across multiple projects

outputPath.description: Output path for the shared configuration

styles.description: Optional list of styles used in the shared configuration

cssCustomProperties.description: Optional list of CSS custom properties

GrimoireConfigCriticalJSON.description: Configuration for critical CSS styles to be inlined. Supports glob patterns in file paths.

fileToInlinePaths.description: List of file paths or glob patterns where critical styles should be inlined

items.description: A file path or glob pattern used to locate files for critical CSS inlining.

styles.description: Optional list of styles to be inlined

cssCustomProperties.description: Optional list of CSS custom properties used in critical styles

CSSCustomPropertiesItemJSON.description: Represents a custom CSS property item, including associated variables

element.description: Optional DOM element associated with the CSS variables (e.g., `tag`, `class`, `id`, `:root`)

dataParam.description: Parameter name used in the CSS configuration

dataValue.description: Value corresponding to the data parameter

cssVariables.description: A set of associated CSS variables and their values
